sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>tsunami</radical> going down your <radical>dry</radical> face is just <kanji>sweat</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Sweat really does feel like a tsunami though. Wow, it's dry and hot out right now!
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>sweat</kanji> isn't just on your face, it's also dripping down your <reading>ass</reading> (<ja>あせ</ja>).
readingInfo: The one place you wish sweat wouldn't go, but somehow it always does: the ass.
